page.text: NTgCalls starting from version 1.2.0 supports asynchronous calls to function using ntg_async_struct, which contains userData that can be used to pass data between the caller and the callback, promise that is called when the operation is completed, and error that is set when an error occurs, but by default it is set to #NTG_ASYNC_NOT_READY (-4) until the operation is completed.
